Package xxl.core.indexStructures

Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Descriptor A descriptor describes the region represented by a given subtree.
MVBTree.Version This is an interface for version instances used by the MVBTree.
 

Class Summary
AutoDeleteMVBTree This class extends the MVBTree with auto-delete functionality, i.e.
AutoDeleteMVBTree.NotifyHeap<E> This class extends the DynamicHeap by providing a mechanism to notify a listener whenever an object in the heap changes its position.
BPlusTree This class implements a B+Tree.
BPlusTree.KeyRange This class represents key ranges (i.e. intervals of keys).
BPlusTreeBulkLoading This class provides functionality to bulk-load a BPlusTree.
BTree This class implements a B+Tree.
Descriptors This class contains static methods for descriptors.
GreenesRTree An RTree implementing the split-strategy proposed by D.
HilbertRTree HilbertRTree with R*tree split(1-2 split policy) and BPlusTree merge strategies.
HilbertRTree.ORKeyRange  
HilbertRTree.ORSeparator Extends Separator with Rectangle field which represents the MBR.
HilbertRTreeBulkLoading This class provides functionality to bulk-load a HilbertRTree.
LinearRTree An RTree implementing the linear split-strategy proposed in the original R-Tree paper.
LinearRTreeAT An RTree implementing the split-strategy proposed by C.H.
MTree An ORTree for objects with spheres as regions.
MultiDiskBTree This class implements a BTree which stores its leaf-nodes on multiple disks.
MVBTree  
MVBTree.BlockDelInfo Contains information about one block of the MVBTree, i.e. the block's ID in the underlying container and the block's deletion version.
MVBTree.Lifespan Objects of this class are version intervals and represent life spans of the entries sotred in the MVBTree.
MVBTree.LifeSpanSeparator Need to handle root in the bplus tree with max key
MVBTree.MVRegion  
MVBTree.MVSeparator  
ORTree The class ORTree (Overlapping Region Tree) is a generic and highly flexible super-class that implements features used by grow- and post-trees which stores objects with descriptors which may overlap.
QuadraticRTree An RTree implementing the quadratic split-strategy proposed in the original R-Tree paper.
QueryCursor This class represents lazy Cursors which can be used to perform queries on a Tree.
RevisedRTree Revised R*-Tree For a detailed discussion see Norbert Beckmann, Bernhard Seeger: "A Rivised R*-Tree in Comparsion with Related Index Structures"
RTree An ORTree for objects with bounding rectangles as regions.
Separator This class describes the known separtors of the B+ tree.
SlimTree A dynamic tree for organizing metric datasets.
SortBasedBulkLoading This class provides functionality to bulk-load different types of trees.
Sphere This class implements a Descriptor that is a sphere.
Tree The Tree-class is a generic and highly flexible super-class that implements features used by grow- and post-trees.
XTree The XTree is a variant of the RTree for high dimensional data which avoids splits which would result in high overlap.
 

Package xxl.core.indexStructures Description

Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
